thread.title: Great Hotel
thread.title_full: Great Hotel - Review of Mercure Paris La Defense, Courbevoie, France - TripAdvisor

author: VerAgu23
title: Great Hotel
text:
We have been here for 3 days already and Love the fact it is Sooo close to Metro Station. Only a 10mins walk or you can take the 3 mins free shuttle from the Hotel. Very easy to access Any tourist spot from here. Service at desk has been Phenomenal. They speak Spanish and English without hesitation and give the best directions. Got a room where previous visitor had been smoking and they didn't even bat an eye when I asked for a New room. I have 2 more days to go and I know they will be just as wonderful. Will definitely be staying here again.
See all photos
